Uses of Package
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler

Packages that use me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler
Package
Description
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler
This package provides multiple scheduling algorithms that the servers can use.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server
This package provides the main functionality to create resource pools and servers.
  • Classes in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler used by me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler
    Class
    Description
    AbstractScheduler
    Each server has a scheduling policy that defines how the server resources are allocated to work units.
    BackfillingScheduler
    Abstract class with helper methods common across all backfilling policies.
    ConsBackfillScheduler
    ConsBackfillScheduler class is an allocation policy for Server that implements conservative backfilling.
    ReservationScheduler
    Common interface that schedulers that enable reservations must implement in order to be used by Server.
    Scheduler
    Common interface that all schedulers must implement in order to be used by Server.
    SortAlgorithm
    An enumerator that maps some sorting algorithms to their corresponding job comparators.
  • Classes in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler used by me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server
    Class
    Description
    AbstractScheduler
    Each server has a scheduling policy that defines how the server resources are allocated to work units.
    Scheduler
    Common interface that all schedulers must implement in order to be used by Server.
